shift_event_obj.from_anchor: Journey to the Center of the Earth

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Given your preference for films from 1988, historical settings, and a hint of action, I'd recommend taking a look at 'The Dirty Dozen'. This film is packed with high-energy stunts and features an all-star cast including Jim Brown, Richard Jaeckel, George Kennedy, Charles Bronson, Lee Marvin, Donald Sutherland, and Ernest Borgnine. Enjoy the thrilling ride!
rec_titles: The Wind That Shakes the Barley
